fields.description: Fresh graduate from Carnegie Mellon University seeking for an entry-level position as Front End Developer.

I am a master student majoring in environmental engineering at Carnegie Mellon University. I got my B.S. of Environmental Engineering in Zhejiang University (Ranking: top 10%). I am interested in computer-based environmental modeling, environmental technology consulting and other challenging job opportunities that will utilize my analytical and interpersonal skills.

Eric Zhuang is a Mechanical Engineer at Foxconn, engaging in manufacturing design practices for iPhone enclosure and accessories. Experience in metal and plastics manufacturing for mass production.

Eric has strong background in Mechanical Design and CAD Design, which includes technical experience in Solidworks, Unigraphics, AutoCAD, and machine shop. He also has extensive knowledge in high volume manufacturing processes and tolerance analysis.

Specialties: design for manufacturing, product design, mass production practices, 3-D CAD modeling, product development

● Focused and motivated multi-tasker with diverse experience in LabVIEW coding (CLAD), signal processing, system control, thermo-simulation, 3-D modeling and structure design.
● SCM Programming based on Arduino and C51, LabVIEW coding based on PCI, DAQ, cRIO, sbRIO. 
● Fluent in English, Mandarin and Cantonese

● Major in Mechanical Engineering but passionate about Web Development 
● Fast learner and effective team player with strong interpersonal skills

Looking for an internship in the field of Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning/Oil and Energy/Mechatronics 
Proficient in Air Conditioning and Refrigeration System Design and Validation
Hands-on experience with Test Rig Setup and Control System Design 
Strong skills in Thermal System Analysis, 3-D CAD Modeling, CFD and Programming 
Outstanding communication and presentation skills, self-motivated and good team worker

1. Clustered, filtered and transformed thousands of project manual data to maintain consistency
2. Built a simple website for CMU staff to fast search for the manual
Helped to collect data and provide official reports for different monitoring programs.

1. Designed Project Approval Flowchart for the Hong Kong branch line of National Natural Gas Project
2. Assisted in holding Technical Seminar and gained technical knowledge in power system by field trips 
3. Conducted survey, analyzed the data and proposed measures for company’s Knowledge Management project
Test and technical support on DAQ, cRIO, motion control and vision based project; Control Design and Simulation Demo Development.

1. Investigated and recorded the performance of approximately 100 elevators in over 20-year-old commercial buildings 
2. Analyzed the collected elevator data and proposed elevator modernization solutions to the property management company

Air China Limited (simplified Chinese: 中国国际航空公司; traditional Chinese: 中國國際航空公司; literally: "China International Airlines Company", colloquially known as 国航/國航, SEHK: 0753, LSE: AIRC, SSE: 601111) is the flag carrier[citation needed] and one of the major airlines of the People's Republic of China, with its headquarters in Shunyi District, Beijing.

The Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing with computers and consumer electronics. The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, iPads, iPhones, third-party accessories, and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV. All stores offer a Genius Bar for technical support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public, while some high-profile stores feature a theater for presentations and workshops and a studio for training with Apple products.

Mercedes-Benz is a German automobile manufacturer, a multinational division of the German manufacturer Daimler AG. The brand is used for luxury automobiles, buses, coaches, and trucks. 
The name first appeared in 1926 under Daimler-Benz but traces its origins to Daimler-Motoren-Gesellschaft's 1901 Mercedes and to Karl Benz's 1886 Benz Patent Motorwagen, which is widely regarded as the first automobile. Mercedes-Benz's slogan is "Das Beste oder nichts" (English: "The best or nothing"). Mercedes-Benz is part of the "German Big 3" luxury automakers, along with Audi and BMW, which are the best selling luxury automakers in the world.

China Eastern Airlines Corporation Limited is an airline headquartered in the China Eastern Airlines Building, on the grounds of Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport in Changning District, Shanghai, China. It is a major Chinese airline operating international, domestic and regional routes. Its main hubs are at Shanghai Pudong International Airport and Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, with secondary hubs at Kunming Changshui International Airport and Xi'an Xianyang International Airport. China Eastern Airlines is China's second-largest carrier by passenger numbers.

China Mobile Communications Corporation is a Chinese state-owned[4] telecommunication company that provides mobile voice and multimedia services through its nationwide mobile telecommunications network. The company is the largest mobile telecommunications company by market capitalization today, and it was named as such in March 2011. China Mobile Limited is listed on both the NYSE and the Hong Kong stock exchange. As of July 2013, China Mobile is the world's largest mobile phone operator by subscribers with about 760 million. The ARPU(Average revenue per user) for the company stays at 90 Renminbi since 2004.

DHL Express is a division of the German logistics company Deutsche Post DHL providing international express mail services. Deutsche Post is the world's largest logistics company operating around the world. DHL is a world market leader in sea and air mail.

Huawei Technologies Co. Ltd. is a Chinese multinational networking and telecommunications equipment and services company headquartered in Shenzhen, Guangdong. It is the largest telecommunications equipment maker in the world, having overtaken Ericsson in 2012.

Ryohin Keikaku Co.,Ltd. is a Japanese retail company which sells a wide variety of household and consumer goods. Muji is distinguished by its design minimalism, emphasis on recycling, avoidance of waste in production and packaging, and no-logo or "no-brand" policy. The name Muji is derived from the first part of Mujirushi Ryōhin, translated as No Brand Quality Goods on Muji's European website.

SF Express (Group) Co., Ltd. is a Chinese delivery services company based in Shenzhen, China. It is one of the two leading couriers in China, and provides domestic and international express delivery solutions to a wide array of customers. SF Express has a fleet of 31 cargo aircraft, of which 13 are owned by its subsidiary SF Airlines.

Siemens AG is a German multinational conglomerate company headquartered in Berlin and Munich. It is the largest engineering company in Europe. The principal divisions of the company are Industry, Energy, Healthcare, and Infrastructure & Cities, which represent the main activities of the company. The company is a prominent maker of medical diagnostics equipment and its medical health-care division, which generates about 12 percent of the company's total sales, is its second-most profitable unit, after the industrial automation division.

fields.post_content:
Requirement: 
500 hours PIC in B737EFIS or 1,000 hours PIC in B737NG. 3,000 hours total time, age under 53 years old at start of assignment, current on B737 type within the preceding 12 months. 

Compensation (net amount received by pilot): 
Option A: 6 weeks ON, 2 weeks OFF, $19,000 USD plus $200 USD per hour for hours over 230 hours in three months. 
Option B: 4 weeks ON, 3 weeks OFF, $15,500 USD per month plus $200 USD per hour over 80 hours. 
Option C: 11 months ON, 1 month OFF plus 14 holidays annually, $21,500 USD per month plus $200 USD per hour over 80 hours. Contract term: 3 years (renewable)

Job Summary

Keeping an Apple Store thriving requires a diverse set of leadership skills, and as a Manager, you’re a master of them all. In the store’s fast-paced, dynamic environment, you exhibit composure as you learn from each new challenge. You build and inspire high-performing teams of unique individuals who deliver positive experiences for customers as they learn, shop, and get support. Most importantly, you share the Apple vision with employees and customers.

Key Qualifications

Proven ability to drive amazing customer experiences — and results — through team development.
Experience with diplomatically managing multiple commitments to customers, staff, and operations.
Ability to adapt to challenges while remaining calm in a constantly changing retail environment.

Program Prerequisites 
In order to qualify for the ELITE START program you must be a UTI student or graduate. In addition you must have completed all Automotive Technology core program courses except:
#Power and Performance 1a
#Power and Performance 1b
#Power and Performance 2
#Professional Service Writing

Program Type: Elective 
Program Length: 12 weeks 
Course Content: (Click on the course titles below to see more detail.)
# Introduction to Mercedes-Benz and Mercedes-Benz Electrical
# Interior Disassembly and Chassis Electronics
# Driving Dynamics and Climate Control Systems
# Engine Management, Pre-Delivery Inspection and Maintenance

Requirement:
2000 PIC in B737, B757 or B767 type, 6,000 hours total time, 3,000 hours PIC in multi-engine commercial jet aircraft, age under 50 years old at start of assignment, recurrent training in type within last 6 months. 

Compensation:
Option 1: 45 days ON,15 days OFF $21,000/$20,000 USD per month base, Plus $ 225 USD per hour over 160 hours in 2 months. 
Option 2: Schedule according to company needs $15,600/$14,300 USD per month base plus $210 USD per hour over 80 hours per month. Plus an additional Safety and Operations Award of $6,000 USD per year. 

Contract term: 4 years (renewable)

Responsibilities:
# Design, specify and advise on the most suitable communications solution to satisfy customer needs
# Participate in the preparation of tender responses and non-standard contracts with the assistance of legal advisers where necessary
# Participate in the preparation and provision of high quality generic product, services, regulatory and strategy presentations at seminars, conferences and trade shows
# Participate in technical SLA and contract negotiation
# Handle adhoc projects as required
 
Requirements:
# Degree or above in Telecommunication, Computer Engineering or related disciplines
# Minimum 3 years’ relevant experience, preferable gained from Telecommunications market
# Experience in pre-sales support or related positions is preferred
# Knowledge in IPLC, IEPL, IP VPN, IP Transit, IDC products is an advantage
# Good project management skill and communication skill
# Excellent teamwork skills, hardworking, self-motived and able to work under pressure
# Good command in spoken and written English and Chinese; Fluent in Putonghua is an advantage
# Less experience will be considered as Assistant Solution Consultant

Responsibilities:

# Prepare billing reports for carriers, inter-companies and regional offices
# Monitor data and internet invoices and perform audit to determine the validity of the invoices
# Coordinate with internal departments and other regional offices to reconcile inter-company billings
# Work closely with internal departments in responding to billing-related enquiries
# Review, summarize and track billing position summary for data and internet businesses
# Assist in developing and implementing the Data Billing Standard Operating Procedures


Requirements:

# Bachelor Degree in Business or related discipline
# Minimum 4 year of working experience in billing operation, preferably in telecom industry
# Understanding of carrier billings and/or partnership environment is an advantage
# Positive working attitude with the ability in handling multitasks
# Assertive with good communication skills
# Proficiency in MS Office applications
# Good command of spoken and written Chinese and English, proficiency in Putonghua is a MUST.

We are looking for a Business Analyst, Customer Integration to join our DHL eCommerce team!

The Business Analyst, Customer Integration will be responsible for gathering customer requirements and managing customer integrations. The new role will also help to significantly reduce the onboarding effort of new customers and it wil ensure that regional standards are applied and leveraged. The successful candidate will also provide business analyst, IT expertise in inbound and outbound China business initatives.
The successful candidate will be based in Shanghai, China.

Essential Responsibilites and Duties:

Project Management
•       Gather business requirements and specify change requests for inbound and outbound China project
•       Provide business analysis, IT expertise to support new business initiatives
•       Conduct discovery call to understand customer internal workflow and capability 
•       Identify any integration issues and resolve with the customer
•       Create and maintain customers' system accounts
•       Provide user training on web portal

Description:
# To implementation project of the Software Services BSS solution which includes OCS, Billing and CRM system.
# To assist in project transition from engineering to operation from technical stand point.
# To be involved in maintenance and operation phase of the project when required.
 
Requirements:
# Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in the field of ICT or Telecommunication.
# Good command in English.
# Familiar with Telecom Operational Support System, Billing System, Value-added Services.
# Some experience in implementation of Telecom equipment site survey, BSS/Consumer/VAS system logical design and integration documentation design, IP datacom network design, Disaster recovery, Linux OS, Shell scripting, Oracle Database server administration, SQL scripts technical hands on.
# Some experience in handling Sun, IBM and HP Mini computers in cluster mode.
# Project and support maintenance experience in telco industry.
# Familiar with all the operational and project delivery processes involved.
# Fresh graduates with second class and above are encouraged to apply.

About The Program
At Siemens, we dare to ask ourselves how we can make a difference. Our Energy Sector offers some of the most innovative products, solutions and services available today and we choose to be responsible for creating the energy systems of the future.

Our internship program is the pathway to a career with our company – this is your opportunity to discover what inspires
you. Participants gain real-world work experience and have the ability to learn from our team of leaders. You will work hands-on with some of the most technically advanced power generation equipment in the industry. Day-to-day tasks include:
•	 design & analysis
•	 manufacturing
•	 service engineering
•	 project engineering
•	 quality assurance

Who Should Apply?
We’re looking for people who are resourceful – true problem solvers who challenge themselves to find the
most effective and efficient solutions.
Majors: Mechanical, Electrical, Industrial or Aerospace Engineering
Education: Rising junior, senior or current Graduate student pursuing a degree from an accredited college or university

Position Overview 

The systems engineer is responsible for a variety of engineering tasks in the field of process automation. He/She successfully applies fundamental concepts, practices and procedures to support project engineering. Builds up basic knowledge and broadens to whole scope of tasks. Involvement in technology development as a team member. Drives quality and improvements to minimize non-conformances
This position will report to Engineering Manager Industry Automation/Automation Systems/Process Automation. 

Responsibilities 

The position is responsible for participating in the Process Automation projects. The detail list of responsibilities includes:
• Identify user requirements using P&IDs, process description and or existing logic
• Document the Software Functional Design and hardware functional requirements
• Review and approve system panel drawings and coordinate efforts with panel builders
• Develop PLC code using Function Block, Statement List, SFC, Ladder and Structured Language for batch and continuous programming
• Create test documents , test simulations and perform hardware, logic, sequences and batch tests 
• Participate in commissioning activities 


Required Knowledge/Skills, Education, and Experience

• BS in a related engineering field (Electrical, Computers, Instrument, Chemical), 
• Minimum 2-5 years of DCS or PLC programming experience preferably for both continuous process control and batch programming
